reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: RISORSA TERRA. SVILUPPO, TRASFERIMENTO E ADATTAMENTO DI BUONE PRATICHE PER LA SICUREZZA NUTRIZIONALE DI BAMBINI E MAMME NELLE REG

description.narrative: Il progetto promuove l'empowerment delledonne rurali con particolare attenzione ai temi della sicurezza nutrizionale e intende migliorare leperformance e la sostenibilità dei servizi pubblici per la sicurezza nutrizionale
The project aims at promoting the empowerment of rural women relating to food security issues and at improving public services dealing with food security

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AMICI DELLO STATO BRASILIANO ESPIRITO SANTO - CENTRO DI COLLABORAZIONE COMUNITARIA ONG

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons

By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)
